reviewText: Big, big fan of Mike Holmes' original show.  Would have liked to see more of his episodes involving bathrooms. There were some episodes that would have been better suited to a "Best of" DVD, but these are fun to see again.
you can't go wrong with mike holmes showing how to do things the right way
Mike Holmes is my "Do It Right" hero for my DIY projects.
Not my country but amazed that so much applies.

Mike Holmes is the master when it comes to home building and repair. Theses videos are great. I will watch these many
times.

My wife and I watched this DVD in preparation for selecting contractors and being ready to review their work before we remodeled our master bath. Very helpful and the terminology was quite useful for us.

My husband loves Holmes and Homes and we own several of the Holmes on Homes regular seasons (season 1, season 2, etc).  Purchased this one because he thought it would give him some extra insight/tips/tricks/etc for working in bathrooms.  Turns out that this DVD is just a collection of some of the regular Holmes on Homes shows that feature bathroom remodels.  So, all the episodes on this DVD are ones that we already have on other DVD's.  Kind of disappointed that the content isn't anything different.  If you don't own any of the full-season DVD's and only want to see some shows about remodeling bathrooms only, then purchase this.  It is the same great Mike Holmes quality remodeling jobs.  But, if you love Holmes on Homes (like my husband), then spend a couple more bucks and buy a season's worth of the shows and you'll end up getting the same content as what is on this video plus more.
